task.title: Edit Field Outline
task.shortdesc: Specify the fields to be printed in the Result List section for each Result Set.

step.cmd: To add a field to the outline, click Add field to report.../+ and select a field name from the list. Alternatively, you may select User Defined Tier, or you may selectCustom to create a custom field.

stepresult.note: Specify which user-defined tiers to include by editing their Options, to the right of the field outline (i.e. Change the Field name and fill in the Tier name).
Creating a custom field may require some familiarity with Javascript.

step.cmd: If applicable, choose whether to Remove group markers by using the check box in Options.
To remove a field from the outline, select it and click Remove selected field from report/- or press Delete/Backspace.
To re-order a field, select it and use the up/down arrows to move it higher or lower in the outline.
